name: BlissBox
title: blissbox.life
shortDescription: BlissBox is a digital platform designed to capture and preserve memories for any occasion. Users can create a 'memory box' to collect messages, photos, and appreciations from events like weddings, retreats, or family gatherings. It's ideal for event organizers, families, or anyone looking to keep memories alive in a unique, digital format. Example: A wedding where guests can leave digital notes and photos that can be revisited years later.
pros: Allows instant photo uploads with messages
Messages can be sealed and opened later
